about_the_game:
Please note that this game is exclusively compatible with computers operating Windows 10 or higher due to its reliance on Windows 10's voice recognition feature for voice controls. To experience the game optimally, we recommend ensuring that your system is updated to the latest version before downloading.

Your wishlisting matters to us! As a budding team and small game development studio, each wishlist and each addition to our community counts and means a lot to our journey. Your support makes a significant difference – thank you!


Immerse yourself in the captivating realm of ancient gods and set forth on an extraordinary odyssey where you embody the essence of Poseidon, the revered deity of the seas. As the embodiment of this formidable god, you will chart an epic journey through a richly immersive experience that beckons you to traverse the uncharted depths of the aquatic domain.

In this pioneering adventure, you will assume the role of the voice of Poseidon, steering a raindrop through a mesmerizing world teeming with astonishing and profound transformations. Each moment within this magical journey unfolds like a symphony, where the ebb and flow of your decisions orchestrate the fates of the elements.



Prepare to be enthralled by the captivating tales of Greek mythology as you traverse a series of diverse levels, each inspired by the very gods they represent. Your voice is your most potent tool in this grand odyssey, and with it, you shall command the elements themselves. Traverse through the captivating terrains inspired by the gods, and wield the authority of your voice to command the forces of nature. Watch as the world around you responds to your voice, shifting and transforming under your influence. Envision wielding the power of Poseidon, the god of the seas, as you manipulate the tides, or invoke the wrath of Medusa to forge new paths.

Navigate through the visually captivating 2D landscapes, each meticulously hand-painted to exude an immersive and aesthetic allure. Explore a world where every stroke of the paintbrush tells a story, every color scheme forms an emotion, and every meticulously crafted detail enriches the tapestry of your journey.



Harness your mastery over the three fundamental states of matter – ice, water, and vapour – by unleashing the latent power residing within your voice. Immerse yourself in a visually stunning hand-painted 2D platformer, where the extraordinary lies within the intricate puzzles waiting to be unravelled. With your voice as the ultimate tool, you'll manipulate the states of matter, unlocking a world of enchanting puzzles that transcend the conventional bounds of a typical gaming experience. This remarkable journey invites you to engage with an array of challenging puzzles, where the duality of simplicity and complexity seamlessly intertwines.



The compelling fusion of your voice's influence and the vividly hand-painted universe presents an unparalleled adventure. Explore, solve, and conquer challenges as you journey through an immersive platformer that stands as a testament to the harmony between your voice and the intricate world of matter. Prepare to embark on an experience where your voice is not merely a tool, but a catalyst for uncovering the beauty, complexity, and interconnectedness of the fundamental states of matter, paving the way for a uniquely mesmerizing gaming adventure

short_description: Become Poseidon's voice and harness the elemental power of ice, water, and vapor in this enchanting 2D platformer, drawing inspiration from the rich tapestry of Greek mythology. Your voice becomes the key to unlocking intricate puzzles in a visually striking world.
